00029 Tuplet::~Tuplet()
00030       {
00031       //
00032       // delete all references
00033       //
00034       for (iChordRest i = elements.begin(); i != elements.end(); ++i) {
00035             ChordRest* cr = i->second;
00036             cr->setTuplet(0);
00037             }
00038       }
00039 
00040 //---------------------------------------------------------
00041 //   remove
00042 //---------------------------------------------------------
00043 
00044 void Tuplet::remove(ChordRest* a)
00045       {
00046       for (iChordRest i = elements.begin(); i != elements.end(); ++i) {
00047             if (i->second == a) {
00048                   elements.erase(i);
00049                   return;
00050                   }
00051             }
00052       }
